data.lyric:
[ti:Get Along Better (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Ty Dolla $ign]
[al:Certified Lover Boy (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Get Along Better (Explicit) - Drake/Ty Dolla $ign
[00:00.86]Lyrics by：A. Graham/P. Jefferies/T. Griffin Jr./N. Cadastre/N. Shebib
[00:02.26]Composed by：A. Graham/P. Jefferies/T. Griffin Jr./N. Cadastre/N. Shebib
[00:03.67]Drake：
[00:03.77]Uh
[00:04.30]
[00:06.53]This might be too real too real
[00:09.40]Drake/Ty Dolla $ign：
[00:10.34]
[00:16.25]Hold me closer in these
[00:20.15]Trying times supposed to be mine
[00:24.22]Baby
[00:26.51]
[00:28.34]I need some help just like anyone else
[00:32.35]Hold me closer in these
[00:36.19]Trying times open your eyes
[00:40.22]Baby
[00:42.59]
[00:44.26]You said you felt something for me
[00:47.55]
[00:49.43]Talk to 'em
[00:50.10]
[00:51.34]I don't know when
[00:53.41]
[00:54.18]Based on the signals you send
[00:57.60]
[00:58.20]Based on the way you apologized
[01:01.96]When you came to see me and then
[01:05.27]Then what
[01:06.24]You had the nerve to defend
[01:09.22]Defend what
[01:10.06]Mistakes that you made at the end
[01:13.62]
[01:14.31]You said I was too invested
[01:16.86]And that's what had forced you to go and pretend
[01:20.96]I swear you crazy
[01:22.46]Someone that's close to you reached out to me
[01:25.54]Just to see if we had made amends
[01:29.39]Oh
[01:30.31]Trust me this ain't 'bout revenge
[01:33.83]But now I get along better with your friend
[01:38.07]
[01:38.95]Woo
[01:39.21]
[01:40.06]And it's wrong I know
[01:42.69]Know know know
[01:43.84]But again
[01:45.45]Ooh yeah
[01:46.40]Trust me this ain't 'bout revenge
[01:50.43]I get along better with your friend
[01:53.78]Oh
[01:54.51]
[01:56.14]And it's wrong I know it's wrong I know oh
[02:00.40]
[02:02.60]Drake：
[02:03.01]
[02:07.32]No
[02:08.71]
[02:10.34]You said you felt you said you felt
[02:14.31]Something that's different from everyone else
[02:18.16]You had the nerve to still ask for my help
[02:22.20]Dug you out ditches you buried yourself ah-oh
[02:27.64]
[02:28.22]You said you fell
[02:30.15]And I took your word that night in our hotel
[02:34.24]One thing about time surely time's gonna tell
[02:38.24]Never had to work for much so you said it yourself ah-oh oh
[02:44.44]Can't let it go can't get this out of me
[02:48.30]This s**t still bothers me
[02:50.29]Don't you dare
[02:51.46]Don't you dare
[02:52.32]Don't say you're proud of me
[02:54.23]Hurt's just unreal to me
[02:56.41]Now you wanna come crack to me
[02:58.18]
[02:59.33]Crack crack
[03:00.25]Three whole years after me
[03:02.37]Why did you wait 'til the end
[03:05.19]Drake/Ty Dolla $ign：
[03:06.24]Trust me this ain't 'bout revenge
[03:09.92]But now I get along better with your friend friend
[03:16.16]And it don't feel wrong but again
[03:21.12]
[03:22.25]Trust me this ain't 'bout revenge
[03:25.08]
[03:26.21]I get along better with your friend
[03:29.67]
[03:31.01]Oh and it's wrong I know but again
[03:36.98]
[03:38.15]Trust me this ain't 'bout revenge
[03:41.06]
[03:42.16]I get along better with your friend
